attributes.action: Encourage dialogue, aid efforts, and prioritize diplomacy
attributes.additional_details: The urgent plea to the UK Government and Parliament addresses the humanitarian crisis within the Israeli-Palestinian conflict. Immediate diplomatic intervention is crucial for a ceasefire, constructive dialogue, and humanitarian aid. Upholding international law, advocating for inclusive peace talks, and leveraging the UK's historical commitment to global peace are vital. The UK's proactive involvement can significantly contribute to ending suffering and fostering a secure, prosperous future for all involved.
attributes.background: The UK Government and Parliament must act swiftly on the Israeli-Palestinian conflict. Urgently advocate for a ceasefire, support dialogue, and provide vital humanitarian aid. Uphold international law and human rights, while pushing for inclusive peace talks with all stakeholders.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Seek to start peace talks between Israel and Palestine to resolve the conflict: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649401

Call for an immediate ceasefire in Israel and Gaza: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649130

Support the establishment of new democratic government in Gaza and the West Bank: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/651395

Urge the Israel Government to allow fuel, electricity and food into Gaza: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648383

Increase aid and support for Palestinians: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648337 

Call for Israel to immediately establish a humanitarian corridor in Gaza: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648642
